interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2021/12/31
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'frightening scenes', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Johannes Roberts'], 'Producers': ['Robert Kulzer', 'James Harris', 'Hartley Gorenstein', 'Martin Moszkowicz'], 'Starring': ['Kaya Scodelario', 'Hannah John-Kamen', 'Robbie Amell'], 'Studio': ['SCREEN GEMS']}
Review Text: Loved this, holds so true at times to the games with little things. Starts off so solid and I guess due to time and plot they forced alot into this one movie. Would have just loved of they somehow made this two parts to do this even better
Review Title: Wonderful video game movie adaptation
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
